text: This seems to reproduceable using Linux.

text: This should not block the release of 1.2
No, it will not block, but is a known issue for 1.2.
creator: roku@apache.org
thomas@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 14361
numberTags.xsl.diff

Caused by renumbering element nodes after inserting linebreaks (between tags),
as in case of insert-after. Counting element nodes shouldn't depend on
whitespace formatting. Therefore we're counting element nodes only now.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: thank you, works like a charm. commited to both branches
